transforms.code:
# Create the instances for this pen list, utilizing the entries in the 
	# trendConfig.allPens to know which pens are enabled.
	
	instances = value['instances']
	instancesToReturn = []
	enabledPens = value['pens']
	
	for instance in instances:
		instanceToReturn = {}
		
		instanceToReturn['instanceStyle'] = instance['instanceStyle']
		instanceToReturn['instancePosition'] = instance['instancePosition']
		instanceToReturn['color'] = instance['color']
		instanceToReturn['group'] = instance['group']
		instanceToReturn['name'] = instance['name']
		
		if instance['name'] in enabledPens:
			instanceToReturn['enabled'] = True
		else:
			instanceToReturn['enabled'] = False
			
		instancesToReturn.append(instanceToReturn)
			
	return instancesToReturn
